title: 0.14 RC3 Crashes

labels.name: E:Desktop Community Bugfixes MVP
labels.description: Misc bug fixes about communities that are due for the MVP

body:

```

Emitting signal:messages.new
Emitting contactUpdated
SIGSEGV: Illegal storage access. (Attempt to read from nil?)
zsh: segmentation fault  ./nim_status_client -d:~/Work/i/14RC3-1
```

## Steps to reproduce

Create new user
Add user as contact from control node
Invite user to join community
Request to join
Crashed sometime after this.

or

Logged in with main account for first time.

### Additional Information

- Status desktop version: 0.14.0 RC3
- Operating System: Mac

and a 3rd

```
Emitting signal:stats
{"type":"messages.new","event":{"notifications":null,"statusUpdates":[{"publicKey":"0x0432efa0fc7245d139d51daddac103c0c43678a94aea827b5b98fcf93138ad722fffd2d1c542b6c81b6d461574a92ee236fa13694e23d0cd9159187db775b2347a","statusType":1,"clock":1693407256,"text":""}],"discordOldestMessageTimestamp":0}}

```
